text.section:
Sec. 31-69. Same—Driver diverting patronage to.
It shall be unlawful for the driver or operator of any taxicab or other passenger vehicle for hire, while engaged in such occupation within the incorporated or unincorporated areas of Miami-Dade County, to divert or attempt to divert a prospective patron from any hotel, motel, apartment house, restaurant, night club, bar, or other business establishment.
